mapper.select: select status,name,description,deadline from taskify.task where name=#{name}
mapper.insert: insert into taskify.task(id, name , description, status, deadline) VALUES(uuid_in(md5(random()::text || clock_timestamp()::text)::cstring), #{request.name},#{request.description},#{request.status},#{request.deadline})

insert into taskify.task_customer(id, task_id, customer_id) values
(uuid_in(md5(random()::text || clock_timestamp()::text)::cstring), #{request.taskId}, #{customerId,typeHandler=com.project.abbTask.config.UUIDTypeHandler})
mapper.select: select t.name t_name, t.status t_status, t.description t_description, t.deadline t_deadline, c.name c_name, c.mail c_mail, c.status c_status, o.name o_name from taskify.task t left join taskify.task_customer tc on t.id = tc.task_id left join taskify.customer c on c.id = tc.customer_id left join taskify.organization o on o.id = c.organization_id where o.id = #{organizationId}
